apple_vendor_description: This tender depiction on Apple devices features two women, one with a deep dark skin tone and the other with a medium skin tone, sharing a loving kiss. Apple's signature glossy 3D shading lends a rich depth to their expressions and the subtle blush on their cheeks, conveying genuine affection.  The soft, rounded edges of the figures and the realistic lighting create an intimate and warm visual, making this emoji a powerful symbol of same-sex love and romantic connection on Apple devices.
